short_summary: Supply, delivery, and manufacture of one new, customized utility trailer. Green procurement information is also provided.
description: The Departments of Public Works and Government Services, and Environment and Climate Change Canada are seeking a supplier to provide a customized utility trailer for use in remote field settings for a mobile avian processing lab and field equipment storage and transport.If that Government of Canada Directive, the actions on plastic waste in federal operations, and the Ocean Plastics Charter apply.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice
### K8B11-240576 Utility Trailer

### Tender Overview
The Government of Canada, on behalf of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to acquire a new, customized utility trailer. The trailer must be capable of transporting and storing equipment for a mobile avian processing lab, as well as other field equipment.

### Key Facts

*   Tender Identification Number: WS4389056375-Doc4389093609
*   Amendment Number: 4
*   Tender Closing Date: March 28, 2024, at 14:00:00 EDT
*   Expected Contract Start Date: May 15, 2024
*   Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN): Not Provided
*   United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC): 25181700 (Product and Material Trailers)
*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Procurement Method and Contract Award

*   The procurement method for this tender is Competitive - Open Bidding.
*   The selection criterion for this procurement is Lowest Price (LPI).

### Environmental Considerations

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) promotes the procurement of environmentally preferable plastic products and the reduction of plastic packaging waste. Respondents are encouraged to use environmentally preferable packaging for all packaged goods to be delivered to the end user as part of this procurement.

### Tender Documentation and Submission

A subscription to Ariba Discovery is required to access the tender documentation. To access the opportunity, visit [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18851965](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18851965). Respondents must submit all required documentation and responses by the closing time specified above.

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact Victor Fupuy at [victor.fupuy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:victor.fupuy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
